title: Oh, THERE you are, Theresa!
author: JGray
text:
See, Theresa? You brought that gun for a reason. Because you knew, in your heart of hearts, that a giant amalgam melty button headed arms dealer would backhand your girlfriend into a tree after giving her a haircut.

I mean, who DIDN'T see that coming? Am I right?

What do you think? Should Chrys just shave it all off and rock the GI Jane look?

See you Thursday!

replies.author: mythtress*Guest*
replies.text: Where do you shoot a button-headed creature that comes apart and is still talking with half of one of its faces melted?  Devil power, don't fail her now!

replies.author: six*Guest*
replies.text: Sure hope she keeps some hair and didn't break anything important from such a hit.

replies.author: Gunsolo*Guest*
replies.text:
Hah! So it was a face-melting laser.

I doubt she'll shave it all off, but maybe she'll sport a mohawk?

replies.author: Musicalife*Guest*
replies.text: Chrys' best option would be to cut her hair, even though she'd look odd without her long hair.

replies.author: Kringles*Guest*
replies.text: I don't know, the newly cut (torn) hair looks great already. It's not everyday that we see a villain give one of our protagonists a "haircut" without it looking terrible.

replies.author: Lukkai*Guest*
replies.text:
Let's give it another page or two for us to admire her new haircut before deciding on any drastic measures, why don't we.

What I've seen so far, she might absolutely rock that look!
